game.towerlogic

Class Tower

  • java.lang.Object
    • common.core.Sprite
      • common.core.ImageSprite
        • common.Tile
          • game.towerlogic.Tower
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Tower
extends Tile
    Represents the tower and holds the tower sprite.

      • isTimeToFire

        public java.lang.Boolean isTimeToFire(double delta)
        Returns true when it is time to fire and false otherwise. If it is time to fire, it resets itself and will return false next time.
        Parameters:
        delta - The delta time when calling the method
        Returns:
        Whether or not it is time to fire
